document.full_text: a man described by authorities as an honorary member of the gambino crime family was sentenced to 13 years in prison on wednesday for conspiring to murder a garbage company owner in 1989.
document.title: man who admitted mafia hit plan sentenced to 13 years
lines_and_colors: a man described by authorities as an honorary member of the gambino crime family was sentenced to 13 years in prison on wednesday for conspiring to murder a garbage company owner in 1989.
